name: B Team: Metal Cartoon Squad
summary: B Team: Metal Cartoon Squad is a Strategy game, developed by Most Wanted Entertainment and published by Virgin Play, which was released in Europe in 2009.

name: B Team: Episode 1 - Dust & Steel
summary: B Team – Episode 1: Dust & Steel is a humorous, squad-based shooter in which the player assumes control over a small private army whose soldiers were hired from all over the world.

name: B Team: Episode 2 - Ice & Venom
summary: The saga continues in B Team - Episode 2: Ice & Venom!

name: BTS World
summary:
The world turns upside down the moment you grab the ticket. When you open your eyes, you’re somewhere unfamiliar, back in the year 2012. Wait, you’re a BigHit employee? 
 
You've just become BTS's manager in a world where BTS doesn't even exist yet. Their debut is now in your hands!

name: BTW: Puzzle Maze
summary:
Engaging, innovative, minimal puzzle game with dozens of levels.

The aim is simple: you need to move through the field and pickup all the circles. The problem is they are visible only on one of two colors – that's why you should use toggles to switch the light.

name: B-Team
summary: The alien invasion is underway! The best and the brightest met the enemy head on, and got their butts kicked for the trouble. Now it is up to you and the members of the B-Team! Dodge to the left. Dodge to the right. Dodge to the left. No, that’s your right. Speed down the path while dodging obstacles and overcoming deadly enemy traps! These aliens are carrying heavy firepower. Use the Team’s special weapons to fight through wave after wave of determined enemies. We are facing an enemy that is truly mentally gifted. Their puzzles and defenses are like nothing you have seen on this planet, unless you have. Put your mind to the test with quick draw challenges! Time to prove you have what it takes to be the the last, 2nd best hope for the planet.

name: BTank
summary: BTank is a game in which you need to destroy balls with different properties using projectiles. By scoring points for destroying the balls, you can get extra lives.

name: BTS Island: In the Seom
summary:
Come over and take a break for a while.

At an island due to an unexpected vacation. BTS Island is a soothing puzzle game where the BTS members make stories and decorate their island. From the BTS Island title logo, character designs, and even the OST! Come play BTS Island: In the SEOM, a game that BTS has been a part of the development process since the beginning.

name: BT21 Tamagotchi
summary: The BT21 Tamagotchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on BT21, mascot characters created by the Korean boy band BTS.

name: BT21 Pop Star
summary: One sudden day, BT21 received a letter and an album filled with their cherished memories. Join BT21 characters to solve the puzzles.

name: BTD: BTD
summary: BTD:BTD is a TPS/FPS game similar to a tactical shooter or survival horror where you fight for survival in a post-apocalyptic world. In a new era without order, brute force is the law and the right to live must be obtained by defeating the enemy in front of you.

name: BTS Cooking On
summary:
Embark on a culinary journey around the world with TinyTAN, characters by BTS!

Invite friends to get up to a ER Photocard & special profile frame.
The more friends you successfully invite, the more rewards you and your friends will receive.

Spread joy all over the world through the magic of food and fill the world in a vibrant purple happiness.
You, as the chef, are about to go on a journey to learn new skills while making friends all across the world.

name: BT Biplanes Online
summary: Challenge friends and players from all over the world in exciting one-on-one online battles. Pilot your biplane with precision and skill, maneuvering through intense dogfights and performing daring acrobatic maneuvers. Improve your biplane's performance with powerful upgrades, fine-tuning its speed, maneuverability and firepower to suit your playstyle. Personalize your aircraft with unique camouflages to stand out on the battlefield. Master the art of air warfare, outwit your opponents and become the ultimate biplane ace.
